item.content:encoded: Goolge+ launches - GAMES!!! http://t.co/afoE72F #googleplus My family has a games closet. Inside you’ll find a few decks of cards, two decades’ worth of board games and a Twister mat for those times when we’re feeling limber. item.description: This is not fail fast but test and learn. LATimes: Test of hypersonic aircraft fails over Pacific Ocean - http://t.co/74Rs801
item.content:encoded: This is not fail fast but test and learn. LATimes: Test of hypersonic aircraft fails over Pacific Ocean - http://t.co/74Rs801 A test flight of an experimental aircraft capable of speeding through air at 20 times the speed of sound ended prematurely Thursday morning, when the arrowhead-shaped plane stopped sending back real-time data to engineers and scientists who were moderating the mission. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: latimes.com

item.title: Facebook Wins “Worst API” in Developer Survey | TechCrunch
item.description: Facebook Wins "Worst API" in Developer Survey http://tcrn.ch/r6hONo
item.content:encoded: Facebook Wins "Worst API" in Developer Survey http://tcrn.ch/r6hONo A survey of over 100 developers, previously posted here on Hacker News, aimed to determine which external APIs were the most difficult to integrate into developers’ projects. The winner…or rather, the loser? Facebook. Developers mentioned the Facebook API the most in terms having bugs, poor documentation, never-ending API changes, slow response times, and other headaches. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: techcrunch.com

item.content:encoded: Aaron, 89 years old, had his shop destroyed during the riots. Help him out at http://t.co/gjnDepf #keepaaroncutting #londonriots "I will probably have to close because I haven’t got insurance and I can’t afford the repairs,” - Aaron Aaron has been in the Tottenham area for 41 years and at 89 is devastated by the damage to his livelihood. Link - Trackbacks

item.content:encoded: Twitter Begins Testing t.co Shortened Links in the Wild http://tcrn.ch/ndhWqC Starting today, Twitter will begin testing its link-wrapping feature which will automatically shorten all URL’s 20 characters long or greater into t.co-wrapped links.
